head.citation-title: Genus sets and SNT sets of certain connective covering spaces
head.abstracts: We study the genus and SNT sets of connective covering spaces of familiar finite CW-complexes, both of rationally elliptic type (e.g. quaternionic projective spaces) and of rationally hyperbolic type (e.g. one-point union of a pair of spheres). In connection with the latter situation, we are led to an independently interesting question in group theory: if f is a homomorphism from Gl(ν, A) to Gl(n, A), ν < n, A = ℤ, resp. ℤ p, does the image of f have infinite, resp. uncountably infinite, index in Gl(n, A)? © Instytut Matematyczny PAN, 2007.

author-keyword.$: General linear group over the integers or the p-adic integers

copyright.$: Copyright 2011 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.
